Class GridConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.grid.GridConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IConfiguration
public class GridConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IConfiguration

Container for settings of the grid module.

Tobias Gesellchen

Constructor Detail

GridConfiguration

public GridConfiguration()
Creates a new GridConfiguration.

GridConfiguration

public GridConfiguration(boolean enableGrid,
                         int serverPort,
                         java.lang.String mediatorAddress,
                         int mediatorPort)
Creates a basic configuration for the grid module and uses the given settings.

Parameters:
enableGrid - a boolean -- true if the grid is enabled
serverPort - an int specifying the port of the server
mediatorAddress - a String containg the server address, the client wants to connect to
mediatorPort - an int specifying the port of the server

copy

public IConfiguration copy()
Description copied from interface: IConfiguration
Returns a copy of the Configuration.

The copy must be independent to the original, so that modifieing the copy does not affect the original.

Specified by:
copy in interface IConfiguration
Returns:
A copy of the Configuration.

serializedForm

public java.lang.String serializedForm()
                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Description copied from interface: IConfiguration
Returns the serialized form of the Configuration.

This statement must always be true:
configuration.equals(configuration.objectForm(configuration.serializedForm))) == true

Specified by:
serializedForm in interface IConfiguration
Returns:
The configuration in a serialized form.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported.
See Also:
IConfiguration.objectForm(String)
